title: Stargazer Academy Welcome
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, ultra detailed anime illustration, 9:16 aspect ratio. A friendly full-body shot of an astronaut in a detailed white and orange space suit, floating in zero gravity directly outside a vast space station observation window, waving hello. Dramatic view looking out from the interior of the futuristic cockpit/bridge, featuring glowing cyan control panels and a screen displaying 'STARGAZER ACADEMY' in the foreground. In the background, a massive, vibrant Earth dominates the curvature, seen against deep space, twinkling stars, and a distant crescent moon. Sci-fi aesthetic, clean line art, soft ambient lighting.
negativePrompt: lowres, worst quality, blurry, mutated, disfigured, monochrome, 3D render, text errors, watermark, signature, cropped, poor anatomy, bad hands, missing limbs.
